channel.title: -Forums Highscores Need Help- -Please Read I Need Help-
channel.description:
[center][u][i][b]THIS IS NOT SERVER RELATED HELP[/b][/i][/u][/center]
[center]You can view them if you would like a link here: [url=http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action=highscores]http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action=highscores[/url]
If you go there you can see the problem if not ill post a image below with more information on what is needed.
[img]http://i951.photobucket.com/albums/ad355/rspsman/Latest/forumshelp.png[/img]
I am using a SMF forums, this problem happened when i switched my overall forum template. Now i know i can just set the highscores page to be displayed with the old template, but i'm looking for a way to fix this.
[u][i]The second table should be off to the right of the skill icons..[/i][/u] [/center]
[center]This page was created in my file host, i can put more info out, and reply if [b]somebody[/b] posts a reply here with any information they know.
PLEASE HELP?[/center]
[center]This might be in the wrong section, i might not be able to post a link, if i did anything wrong here post related please let me know.[/center]

item.title: -Forums Highscores Need Help- -Please Read I Need Help-
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Now iâ€™ve removed every single
from the file.

Here is the Highscores.template.php File contents.

Highscores.template.php

[code]<?php
function template_main() {
global $context, $settings, $options, $txt, $scripturl, $modSettings, $sourcedir;
?>







  • Overall





  • Attack





  • Defence





  • Strength





  • Hitpoints





  • Ranged





  • Prayer





  • Magic





  • Cooking





  • Woodcutting





  • Fletching





  • Fishing





  • Firemaking





  • Crafting





  • Smithing





  • Mining





  • Herblore





  • Agility





  • Thieving





  • Slayer





  • Farming





  • Runecrafting


<div class="thrColAbs">
	<div id="overall">
<? function fixName($name) { return strtolower($name); } function dots($num) { if($num) { $num = number_format($num); } else { $num = "0"; } return $num; } function BBCode($playerName) { // MYSQL mysql_connect('localhost', 'gabriel_default', 'uberness2011'); mysql_select_db('gabriel_highscores'); // CONFIG $ppls_page = "20"; $sig_support = false; $maxhiscorelevel = 99; $sig_image = ""; $top_hiscore = 1000001; $minlvltohiscore = 10; $website = "http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action="; $webtwo = "http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action="; $images = ""; $file = "highscores"; $file2 = "skills"; $pers = "personal"; if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $webbers)) { return $webbers_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $admins)) { return $admins_code.''.ucwords($playerName).'';; } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $high_mods)) { return $high_mods_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $mods)) { return $mods_code.ucwords($playerName); } else if (in_array(fixName($playerName), $donators)) { return $donators_code.''.ucwords($playerName).''; } else { return ucwords($playerName); } } function OverallHiscore() { // MYSQL mysql_connect('localhost', 'gabriel_default', 'uberness2011'); mysql_select_db('gabriel_highscores'); // CONFIG $ppls_page = "20"; $sig_support = false; $maxhiscorelevel = 99; $sig_image = ""; $top_hiscore = 1000001; $minlvltohiscore = 10; $website = "http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action="; $webtwo = "http://elitedemons.org/forums/index.php?action="; $images = ""; $file = "highscores"; $file2 = "skills"; $pers = "personal"; if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = "101"; } echo '
'; $count = mysql_result(mysql_query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skillsoverall WHERE lvl > '299'"),0) or die(mysql_error()); $from = (isset($_GET["from"]) && is_numeric($_GET["from"]) && $_GET["from"] < $count) ? $_GET["from"] : 0; $query = mysql_query ("SELECT * FROM skillsoverall ORDER BY lvl DESC limit $from, $ppls_page") or die(mysql_error()); $i = $from; while($row = mysql_fetch_array($query)){ $i++; if($row["lvl"] > 0) { if($i < $top_hiscore) { if($i & 1) { echo ' '; } else { echo ' '; } } } } echo '
Rank Name Level XP
'.$i.' '.BBCode($row["playerName"]).' '.dots($row["lvl"]).' '.dots($row["xp"]).'
'.$i.' '.BBCode($row["playerName"]).' '.dots($row["lvl"]).' '.dots($row["xp"]).'
'; if($count >= $ppls_page) { echo '
'; if ($from > 0) { $back= $from - $ppls_page; echo 'Back '; } $page = 1; for ($start = 0; $count > $start; $start = $start + $ppls_page) { if($from != $page * $ppls_page - $ppls_page) { if($start < $top_hiscore) { echo ''.$page.' '; } } else { echo $page.' '; } $page++; } if ($from < $count - $ppls_page || $from < $top_hiscore) { $next = $from + $ppls_page; if($next < $top_hiscore) { echo ' Next'; } } echo "
"; } } OverallHiscore(); ?> 
	</div>
</div>
<br />
<br />
<br />	
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />	
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<?php } ?>[/code]

If you look through that you will see this config for that begins the info for their scores table:

if(!$top_hiscore) { $top_hiscore = "101"; } echo '<table border="1" width="80%"> <tr><br /> <th>Rank</th> <th>Name</th> <th>Level</th> <th>XP</th> </tr> ';

There is only one BR in there and i think the " /> " means the end of the script yes?

Iâ€™ve removed that and still got nothing, these are the same setting as my old theme so they should work, and also in there there is alot of "
"

Read full topic
